column4: i have question. Can you help me? does Canon MP250 printer easy working on Ubuntu? I have to buy printer but how it is with drivers on Ubuntu? I long time ago used dot-matrix printer OKI on Ubuntu and i cant print, i can see only unknow symbol printed. How is about new pronters with USB?
http://www.linuxfoundation.org/en/OpenPrinting/Database/DatabaseIntro will give you what works and doesnt
ok, thanks i will check. Do you know what about Cannon pronters?
